reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Promoting an Environment for Conflict Transformation in South of Thailand: Develop and Consolidate Platform of Insider Peacebuilders

description.narrative: The overall objective of this project is to establish an inclusive platform of insider peacebuilders for the Deep South of Thailand who work effectively on the transformation of the conflict from inside of the country. The aims of the project are:1) To inc lude in this group a critical mass of committed and experienced insider peacebuilders and to support their collaboration to form a joint platform for conflict analysis and transformation2) To work together towards the development of a comprehensive Roadmap for Peace and Justice 3) To initiate and cultivate an interactive user-friendly and well designed state of the art website functioning as a public forum 4) To provide a series of peace dialogue and peace mediation facilitation trainings
